snippet: The possible amendment, which President Alassane Ouattara’s party supported, would make husbands and wives equal heads of a household.
abstract: Ivory Coast Pres Alassane Ouattara dissolves his 36-member cabinet after alleged dispute in Parliament over possible amendment to country's marriage law; amendment would make husbands and wives equal heads of household.
lead_paragraph: The possible amendment, which President Alassane Ouattara’s party supported, would make husbands and wives equal heads of a household.

headline.main: Ivory Coast: President Dissolves Cabinet After Dispute Over Marriage Law
headline.print_headline: Ivory Coast: President Dissolves Cabinet After Dispute Over Marriage Law
